enWisdom: Charity is a treasure
Charity protects
Charity is the best means of attaining closeness [to Allah]
Charity is the best of virtuous deeds
Charity is a valuable treasure
Charity protects one from falling into evil

Wisdom: الصَّدَقَةُ فِي السِّرِّ مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْبِرِّ
enWisdom: Charity given secretly is from the best righteous actions
harity is the greater of the two gains
Charity is the better of the two reserves
Charity brings down mercy
Charity repels tribulation and calamity
Make sustenance come down by [giving] charity

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَفْضَلَ الْخَيْرِ صَدَقَةُ السِّرِّ وَبِرُّ الْوَالِدَيْنِ وَصِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: Indeed the best of good deeds are giving charity anonymously, being good with your parents and keeping ties with near relations
When you are blessed with sustenance then give charity
When you become penniless then do business with Allah through charity

Wisdom: إِذَا قَدَّمْتَ مَالَكَ لِآخِرَتِكَ وَاسْتَخْلَفْتَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ عَلَى مَنْ خَلَّفْتَهُ مِنْ بَعْدِكَ سَعِدْتَ بِمَا قَدَّمْتَ وَأَحْسَنَ اللَّهُ لَكَ الْخِلَافَةَ عَلَى مَنْ خَلَّفْتَ
enWisdom: When you send forth your wealth for your Hereafter and leave [the affair of] your heirs in the hands of Allah, you will be felicitous by that which you have forwarded and Allah will take good care of those whom you leave behind
Through charity, death gets deferred
The blessing of wealth is in charity
Make your weights [of good deeds] heavy with charity
Safeguard yourselves through charity
The best charity is that which is given most secretly

Wisdom: دِرْهَمُ الْفَقِيرِ أَزْكَى عِنْدَ اللَّهِ مِنْ دِينَارِ الْغَنِيِّ
enWisdom: The dirham of a poor man is purer in the sight of Allah than the dinar of the rich
Foster your faith with charity

Wisdom: سُوسُوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ بِالْوَرَعِ وَدَاوُوا مَرْضَاكُمْ بِالصَّدَقَةِ
enWisdom: Groom yourselves with piety and cure your sick with charity

Wisdom: صَدَقَةُ السِّرِّ تُكَفِّرُ الْخَطِيئَةَ وَصَدَقَةُ الْعَلَانِيَةِ مَثْرَاةٌ فِي الْمَالِ
enWisdom: Charity given in secret expiates wrongdoings and charity given openly is a means of increasing wealth
Charity given openly repels ill-fated death

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالصَّدَقَةِ تَنْجُ مِنْ دَنَاءَةِ الشُّحِّ
enWisdom: Give charity and you will be saved from the vileness of parsimony

Wisdom: كَفِّرُوا ذُنُوبَكُمْ وَتَحَبَّبُوا إِلَى رَبِّكُمْ بِالصَّدَقَةِ وَصِلَةِ الرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: Expiate your sins and endear yourselves to your Lord through charity and keeping ties with your near relatives
